name: Escape The Room (logeeker)
description:
How will you escape from the room?

My very first Ludum Dare game.

Important:

You may not pass the game if you have a beasty computer.

Just for reference, here's my computer specs:

CPU: 2.9GHz Intel Core i7

Graphics: Intel HD 4000

If your computer is roughly this powerful, you should be fine.

Only the macOS version of the game is tested.

If you like this game please vote for me on Ludum Dare:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...
